module.name: Swiss Army Knife
module.description: I miss a feature. So it winds up here
module.changelog: *1.1.2* dward: makes dial pattern wizards drop down work *1.1.1* dward: Fixed Blank Page, Helped to Disable 'new dial patterns that will use this route' *1.1.0* dward adjusted the display and parsing of numbers with prepend/prefix/callerid *1.0.1* Cleaned up the display of Outbound Routes so its not so confusing, fixed page display issue for blacklist module *1.0* Initial Release
